summary: Iteration 8 - P1/P2 Features Testing: Dynamic Form Rendering, Document Editor, PDF/Excel Exports. All features working correctly.
context_for_next_testing_agent: P1/P2 features fully tested and working. Custom fields for crm_leads module include Industry, Annual Revenue, No. of Employees. Document Editor canvas renders Sales Invoice template with all elements. PDF/Excel exports work for sales, inventory, and customers reports.

login.details: Login with admin@instabiz.com / adminpassword works correctly

power_settings_custom_fields.details: Power Settings page loads and shows 4 custom fields for crm_leads module: Industry (Dropdown), Annual Revenue (Number), No. of Employees (Dropdown), Test Field Iter4 (Text)

crm_leads_dynamic_fields.details: CRM Leads form shows dynamic custom fields rendered from Power Settings. BUSINESS INFO section displays Industry, Annual Revenue, No. of Employees fields correctly

document_editor.details: Document Editor page loads with Templates (Sales Invoice, Quotation, Purchase Order, Delivery Challan, Work Order), Elements, Fields tabs. Sales Invoice template displays canvas with TAX INVOICE header, Company Name & Address, Invoice #, Date, Bill To, Ship To, Items Table, Subtotal, Tax, Grand Total, Amount in Words, Bank Details, QR code placeholder

reports_dashboard_exports.details: Reports & Analytics dashboard shows KPIs (Today's Sales, Month Sales, Pending POs, Alerts), Sales Performance, Top Selling Products, Top Customers, Profit & Loss Summary, Inventory Overview. Export dropdown has PDF and Excel options for Sales, Inventory, and Customer reports

backend_pdf_export.details: Returns PDF file with content-type application/pdf

custom_fields_api.details: Returns array of custom fields with correct structure: field_name, field_label, field_type, options, section, display_order
